thread.title: One Chinese Sector That’s Still in the Game
thread.title_full: One Chinese Sector That’s Still in the Game - WSJ

author: Abheek Bhattacharya
title: One Chinese Sector That’s Still in the Game
text:
Investors sprinting away from China might do well to remember that some pockets of consumption there remain intact. One of these involves the Chinese consumer’s increasing fascination with running.
Nike, the best-selling sportswear brand in the country, recently reported its Chinese sales grew 30% for the three months ending August from the previous year. Anta Sports Products, the largest local player, similarly showed a 24%...
